name: RISE (itch) (Sirnosir)
description:
Our game is fiction.

Our team name is pants slayer WooApp.

Our game is a second creation of a music video called 'RISE', one of the music videos of the game called League of Legend. XD

Reaching the peak takes more than skill. Only those with the ambition to RISE above all others will know its height. 

- 'RISE' , one of the music video of League of Legend.

Our game was made by three high school developers in Korea.

One artist, two programer.
